CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Cross_Border") || ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Direct_Bill") || ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Funded"),"Total Card Based",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"ZCon"),"ZCon",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Smartfund_Fee") || ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Smartfunds"),"SmartFunds",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Money_Codes"),"Money Codes",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Other_Fees"),"Other Fees",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Rebates"),"Rebates",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Revenue_Subtype__c,"Terminal_Fuel"),"Terminal Fuel",
"" )))))))
CustomField.label: High-Level Revenue Category
